mapper.select: /**selectNearpinEnd*/ /**니어핀 종료시작 체크*/ SELECT t1.event_sq eventSq ,t2.round_no roundNo ,t2.end_date endDate ,t1.game_id gameId ,t2.hole_no holeNo FROM kpga.event_mst t1 JOIN kpga.event_near t2 ON t1.event_sq = t2.event_sq JOIN kpga.tb_timepar_game t3 ON t1.game_id = t3.game_id AND t2.round_no = t3.round_no AND t3.seq = (SELECT MAX(t0.seq) FROM kpga.tb_timepar_game t0);

/**selectGameRoundState*/ /**라운드 상태 조회*/ SELECT t1.game_id gameId ,t1.round_no roundNo FROM kpga_db.game_round t1 JOIN kpga.tb_timepar_game t2 ON t1.game_id = t2.game_id AND t1.round_no = t2.round_no AND t1.round_no > 1 AND t1.round_state = '1' AND t2.seq = (SELECT MAX(t0.seq) FROM kpga.tb_timepar_game t0)

/**selectKpsaToGms*/ SELECT t1.vod_seq FROM kpga.kpsa_vod_mst t1 JOIN kpga.kpsa_file t2 ON t1.vod_seq = t2.vod_seq AND t2.vod_type = 1 AND t2.vod_rate = 1 JOIN kpga.tb_timepar_game t3 ON t1.round_no = t3.round_no AND t1.game_id = t3.game_id AND t3.seq = (SELECT MAX(t0.seq) FROM kpga.tb_timepar_game t0 ) WHERE t1.mod_user IS NULL LIMIT 1
